entry.string: Configuration
entry.translation: 設置

entry.string: Global Settings
entry.translation: 全域設定

entry.string: Stores the output generated by Xaraya in a cache for low latency/low overhead serving.
entry.translation: 儲存 Xaraya 產生的輸出於快取來達成低延遲/低運算的服務.

entry.string: Enable the Output Caching System:
entry.translation: 啟用輸出快取系統:

entry.string: Config options can be modified, but no output caching will happen until enabled.
entry.translation: 設定選項已經修改, 但是輸出不會被快取直到被啟用.

entry.string: Output caching is disabled.
entry.translation: 輸出快取被停用.

entry.string: If not sure, select the default theme.
entry.translation: 如果不確定, 選擇預設布景.

entry.string: Cache the Output of this Theme:
entry.translation: 快取這個布景的輸出:

entry.string: Limits the disk usage of the output cache to the specified number of megabytes.
entry.translation: 限制輸出快取的磁碟使用量到限定的 MB 數.

entry.string: Cache Size Limit (in MB):
entry.translation: 快取大小限制 (單位 MB):

entry.string: Page Output Cache Settings
entry.translation: 頁面輸出快取設定

entry.string: If enabled, the pages generated by Xaraya are cached for reuse.
entry.translation: 如果啟用, Xaraya 產生的頁面會被快取來重複使用.

entry.string: Enable Page Output Caching:
entry.translation: 啟用頁面輸出快取

entry.string: The maximum lifetime of a cached page. Set to zero for no time based expiration.
Page Cache Expiration Time (in hh:mm:ss):
entry.translation: 頁面快取過期時間 (格式 hh:mm:ss):

entry.string: If selected, individual item display pages will be cached.
entry.translation: 如果選了，個別項目顯示頁面會被快取住。

entry.string: Cache Item Display Pages:
entry.translation: 快取項目顯示頁面:

entry.string: If selected, the cache will be invalidated when new comments are posted for an item.
Flush Cached Display Page on New Comment:
entry.translation: 有新回應時清除快取的顯示頁面:

entry.string: If selected, the cache will be invalidated when a rating is posted for an item.
Flush Cached Display Page on New Rating:
entry.translation: 有新評價時清除快取的顯示頁面:

entry.string: If selected, the cache will be invalidated when a vote is caste on a poll hooked to an item.
Flush Cached Display Page on New Hooked Poll Vote:
Adds a line to the bottom of cached pages stating the cache time.
Show the "Last Modified" Stamp on Cached Pages:
entry.translation: 顯示 "上次修改時間" 標記於快取的頁面:

entry.string: If enabled, xarCache will send Expires and Cache-Control headers to the client, encouraging the page to be cached locally
Allow clients to reuse locally cached pages without re-validation:
If enabled, the cache of the session-less URLs will be regenerated upon event-based invalidation, triggered by creage/update/delete hooks
Auto-regenerate cache of session-less URL list:

If enabled, xarCache will only cache the pages of modules that have been hooked to the xarCacheModule. Note: this will not prevent cached pages from being served, only stop new pages from being cached.
Only cache pages of modules hooked to xarCacheManger:
Block Output Cache Settings
entry.translation: 區塊輸出快取設定

entry.string: If enabled, block output will be cached for reuse. Please enable hooks to blocks for per instance configuration options.
Enable Block Output Caching:
entry.translation: 啟用區塊輸出快取:

entry.string: The default maximum lifetime of a cached block. Set to zero for no time based expiration.
Block Cache Expiration Time (in hh:mm:ss):
entry.translation: 區塊快取過期時間 (格式 hh:mm:ss):
